'''Radiant Spincrystal 49''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[The Land of Her Serenity]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of boxes in the ramps going in [[Hanamizaka]], going to [[Tenryou]].
